import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Card, CardHeader, CardContent } from "@/components/ui/card"; import { AlertCircle, CheckCircle2 } from "lucide-react"; const StrokePredictionForm = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ gender: "", age: "", hypertension: "", heart_disease: "", ever_married: "", work_type: "", Residence_type: "", avg_glucose_level: "", bmi: "", smoking_status: "", }); const [prediction, setPrediction] = useState(null); const [isSubmitting, setIsSubmitting] = useState(false); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const handleSubmit = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); setIsSubmitting(true); try { const response = await fetch("http://localhost:5000/predict", { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", }, body: JSON.stringify(formData), }); const result = await response.json(); setPrediction(result.stroke); } catch (error) { console.error("Error:", error); } finally { setIsSubmitting(false); } }; return (

Stroke Risk Prediction

Fill in the form below to assess stroke risk factors
{/* Personal Information */}
{/* Medical History */}
{/* Lifestyle Factors */}
{/* Health Metrics */}
{/* Additional Fields */}
{prediction !== null && (
{prediction ? ( ) : ( )}

{prediction ? "Higher Risk Detected" : "Lower Risk Detected"}

{prediction ? "Based on the provided factors, there may be an elevated risk of stroke. Please consult with a healthcare provider for proper medical advice." : "Based on the provided factors, the risk appears to be lower. However, always maintain a healthy lifestyle and regular check-ups."}

)}
); }; export default StrokePredictionForm;
